name: Head Straight for the Top!!!
text:
Main You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: if you have a given DON!! card, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 base power or less and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 base power or less. 
Counter Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
